name: planeshift
description: A HUGE Planeshift-themed package with Kicker, Gating, Battlemages, Volvers, Slivers, Lairs, Charms, Domain, Familiars, and color-matters.

Creature: {TRIGGER_INTRO} return a [GATING_COLOR_WORD] creature {CREATURE_CONTROLLER} to its owner's hand.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} return another [GATING_COLOR_WORD] permanent {CREATURE_CONTROLLER} to its owner's hand.

Kicker [KICKER_COST_OFFCOLOR_A] and/or [KICKER_COST_OFFCOLOR_B].
{TRIGGER_INTRO} if the first kicker was paid, destroy target tapped creature.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} if the second kicker was paid, you gain 4 life and draw a card.

Kicker [KICKER_COST_OFFCOLOR_A] and/or [KICKER_COST_OFFCOLOR_B].
If the first kicker was paid, {SELF} enters with two [COUNTER_KIND] counters on it and gains lifelink.
If the second kicker was paid, {SELF} enters with a [COUNTER_KIND] counter on it and gains trample and haste.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have flying.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have first strike.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have haste.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have vigilance.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have deathtouch.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have "{T}: Add one mana of any color."
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers have "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: All Slivers get +1/+1.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: Whenever a Sliver enters the battlefield under your control, draw a card.
Sliver creatures you control and other Slivers get: Sliver creatures you control have hexproof.
Spells you cast that are blue or green cost {1} less to cast.
Creature spells you cast that are blue or green cost {1} less to cast.
Kavu that gets +1/+1 as long as you control a [PROTECTED_COLOR] permanent.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} tap up to two target creatures.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} CARDNAME deals 2 damage to any target.
{TRIGGER_INTRO} draw a card.
Flying. {TRIGGER_INTRO} return target creature to its owner's hand.
Instant: Domain — Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.. (Count the basic land types among lands you control.)
Domain — CARDNAME deals X damage to any target, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.. (Count the basic land types among lands you control.)

Kicker [KICKER_COST_GENERIC_MID].
Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, draw a card.

Kicker [KICKER_COST_GENERIC_MID].
Target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, it gains trample until end of turn.

Kicker [KICKER_COST_W].
CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, CARDNAME deals 5 damage instead.
Target creature gains protection from [PROTECTED_COLOR] until end of turn.
CARDNAME deals 2 damage to each [PROTECTED_COLOR] creature.
Sorcery: Domain — Draw X cards, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.. (Count the basic land types among lands you control.)
Domain — You gain X life, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.. (Count the basic land types among lands you control.)
Domain — Create X 1/1 [TOKEN_COLOR] [TOKEN_SUBTYPE] creature tokens, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.. (Count the basic land types among lands you control.)

Kicker [KICKER_COST_GENERIC_LOW].
Destroy target artifact. If this spell was kicked, destroy target enchantment.

Kicker [KICKER_COST_W].
Exile target tapped creature. If this spell was kicked, exile up to one untapped creature.

Kicker — Sacrifice a creature.
Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. If this spell was kicked, search for up to two basic land cards instead.
Destroy target [PROTECTED_COLOR] permanent.
Enchantment: Creatures {CREATURE_CONTROLLER} get +1/+1 as long as you control a permanent of each of two colors.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control five or more basic land types, draw a card.
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, you gain 1 life.
Artifact: {T}: Add one mana of any color.
Spells you cast with kicker cost {1} less to cast.
Land:
When {SELF} enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

When {SELF} enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}, {B}, or {R}.

When {SELF} enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {B}, {R}, or {G}.

When {SELF} enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}, {G}, or {W}.

When {SELF} enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return a non-Lair land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}, {W}, or {U}.

CARDNAME doesn't untap during your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile a card from your hand. If you do, untap CARDNAME.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.
{T}: Choose a color of a permanent you control. Add one mana of that color.

{TRIGGER_INTRO} return another [GATING_COLOR_WORD] permanent {CREATURE_CONTROLLER} to its owner's hand.

{TRIGGER_INTRO} if the first kicker was paid, counter target spell unless its controller pays {2}.

notes: This package focuses on Planeshift (2001) mechanics and themes. Charms are represented as modal-style effects. Domain appears as non-keyworded scaling. Lairs and a few iconic lands are included.
